mapper.insert: insert into hotel_in (ID, CREATE_DATE, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_AGE, CUSTOMER_SEX, IDCARD, ROOMID, BUILDING_ID, ELDER_TYPE, CHECKIN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, CONTACTTEL, BED_ID, PSYCHOSOMATICSTATE, ATTENTION, STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{expirationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{contacttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psychosomaticstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update hotel_in set CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_AGE = #{customerAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_SEX = #{customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROOMID = #{roomid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELDER_TYPE = #{elderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKIN_DATE = #{checkinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, EXPIRATION_DATE = #{expirationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CONTACTTEL = #{contacttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BED_ID = #{bedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSYCHOSOMATICSTATE = #{psychosomaticstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTENTION = #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, CREATE_DATE, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_AGE, CUSTOMER_SEX, IDCARD, ROOMID, BUILDING_ID, ELDER_TYPE, CHECKIN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, CONTACTTEL, BED_ID, PSYCHOSOMATICSTATE, ATTENTION, STATUS from hotel_in where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ID, CREATE_DATE, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_AGE, CUSTOMER_SEX, IDCARD, ROOMID, BUILDING_ID, ELDER_TYPE, CHECKIN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, CONTACTTEL, BED_ID, PSYCHOSOMATICSTATE, ATTENTION, STATUS from hotel_in
and CUSTOMER_NAME like concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
and PSYCHOSOMATICSTATE=#{psychosomaticstate}
order by CHECKIN_DATE desc
